statements: SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage;
SELECT footage_id, timestamp FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE location = 'Main Entrance';
SELECT description FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM CCTV_Footage GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, timestamp FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE location = 'Street A'
SELECT description FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE location = 'Parking Lot' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE location IN ('Street A', 'Street B') ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(*), location FROM CCTV_Footage GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM criminal_investigations WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT case_description, suspect_name FROM criminal_investigations WHERE case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT suspect_name FROM criminal_investigations WHERE case_description LIKE '%theft%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC
SELECT activity_name, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2021-09-01' AND activity_type IN ('Fraud', 'Theft')
SELECT DISTINCT activity_type FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_type ASC
SELECT suspect_name, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM criminal_investigations GROUP BY suspect_name HAVING total_activities > 1 ORDER BY total_activities DESC
SELECT sa.activity_name, ci.case_description FROM suspicious_activities sa JOIN criminal_investigations ci ON sa.activity_id = ci.case_id
SELECT id, timestamp, location, camera_id FROM footage;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Break-in';
SELECT location, timestamp FROM footage WHERE camera_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM criminal_investigations ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT suspect_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM criminal_investigations WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM footage WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Break-in' AND location LIKE '%mall%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM criminal_investigations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM footage WHERE location = 'Parking Lot' AND id IN (SELECT id FROM suspicious_activities WHERE camera_id = 2);
SELECT * FROM footage f JOIN suspicious_activities s ON f.location = s.location WHERE f.id = 5 AND s.camera_id = 3 ORDER BY f.timestamp DESC,s.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage;
SELECT footage_id, location FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(footage_id) AS max_id FROM CCTV_Footage;
SELECT activity_description, timestamp FROM Suspicious_Activities ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT criminal_id, name, affiliation FROM Criminals WHERE affiliation = 'Gang';
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE location = 'Street A';
SELECT footage_id, date_recorded FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT activity_description, timestamp FROM Suspicious_Activities WHERE timestamp < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, affiliation FROM Criminals WHERE affiliation = 'Gang A' AND name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT investigation_id, status FROM Investigations WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY investigation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage;
SELECT id, timestamp, camera_id FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE camera_id = 2;
SELECT description, confidence_level FROM Suspicious_Activities WHERE confidence_level > 80;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Suspects ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT crime_type, punishment FROM Criminal_Records WHERE crime_type LIKE 'Theft%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, footage FROM CCTV_Footage WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT activity_type, description FROM Suspicious_Activities WHERE confidence_level > 70;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Suspects WHERE age >= 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Criminal_Records ORDER BY crime_type DESC, punishment ASC;
